channel.title: Need help setting up vps I rep+
channel.description: Help i need help setting up vps I will rep+ you. We can do this thru teamviewer.

item.title: Need help setting up vps I rep+
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:382198”][quote author=belhelmiel link=topic=477997.msg3498001#msg3498001 date=1297488267]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=477997.msg3497988#msg3497988 date=1297486666]
Honestly, your thread all about paying people to help you. Offering rewards is against the rules. If you want your help, why not ask your question!
[/quote]I said I need help setting it up I have no questions I need someone to set it up. It’s simple. Will you help me?
[/quote]Wow, you actually edited your thread. Not many people do that But sure, I will help you.

The first step is always attempting to do it on your own. Have you done that?
If yes, do you have a specific question you need help with?
If no, try to do it on your own.[/quote] Well okay but I have no idea what to do… Okay I attempted now its asking this:
hostname: _ (format: yourdomain.com or name.yourdomain.com) ** what do i put here i dont want to like make a website or anything >.<

Custom Setup Requirements: _ ** no idea

thats all i need help with FOR NOW
PS im using burst.net and what about these:
Configurable Options
OS Template:
Control Panel:
IP Addresses (Base Allocation):
External Backup Storage - (FTP/SSH/RSYNC/VPN/MAPPED):
Fully Managed Service - (Phone Support, Multi-Port Monitoring, 3rd Party Script Basic Assistance, Limited Free O/S Re-installs):
CPanel/WHM Add-On - Fantastico - (Script & Open-Source Software Auto-Installer):
CPanel/DirectAdmin/Plesk(Linux) Add-On - Softaculous - (Script & Open-Source Software Auto-Installer):
Plesk Add-On - Power Pack - (Bundle of SpamAssassin, Application Pack, Helpdesk, PostgreSQL/MSSQL, Tomcat, & ColdFusion Add-Ons):
Plesk Add-On - Language Pack - Additional Language:

Read full topic
item.source: Need help setting up vps I rep+

item.title: Need help setting up vps I rep+
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“belhelmiel, post:3, topic:382198”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=477997.msg3497988#msg3497988 date=1297486666]
Honestly, your thread all about paying people to help you. Offering rewards is against the rules. If you want your help, why not ask your question!
[/quote]I said I need help setting it up I have no questions I need someone to set it up. It’s simple. Will you help me?[/quote]Wow, you actually edited your thread. Not many people do that But sure, I will help you.

The first step is always attempting to do it on your own. Have you done that?
If yes, do you have a specific question you need help with?
If no, try to do it on your own.

Read full topic
